languages.text: "Моя же стая исполнит все, что должно, и встанет на острие штурмового клина. До встречи на поле боя, {name}". {n}Торбальд язвительно улыбается Ульфару.{/n} "И тебе до встречи, Ульфар Пропащий. Жаль, твоя стая не сможет разделить с нами эту славную победу".

"My pack will do all that is asked of it and stand at the vanguard of the assault. Until we meet on the field of battle, {name}." {n}Thorbald looks at Ulfar with a smirk.{/n} "And I say the same to you, Ulfar Everlost. 'Tis a pity your pack will not share in this glorious victory with us."
languages.original_text: "Моя же стая исполнит все, что должно, и встанет на острие штурмового клина. До встречи на поле боя, {name}". {n}Торбальд язвительно улыбается Ульфару.{/n} "И тебе до встречи, Ульфар Пропащий. Жаль, твоя стая не сможет разделить с нами эту славную победу".

'Tis a pity your pack will not share in this glorious victory with us."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: “我的狼群会尽我们所能，一马当先冲在前面。好了，我们战场上见吧，{name}。”{n}索巴德看着乌尔法，得意洋洋地笑了起来。{/n}“我真希望也能对你说出这样的话，迷途之人乌尔法。真可惜，你的狼群没办法与我们一同分享这辉煌的胜利。”
languages.original_text: "My pack will do all that is asked of it and stand at the vanguard of the assault. Until we meet on the field of battle, {name}." {n}Thorbald looks at Ulfar with a smirk.{/n} "And I say the same to you, Ulfar Everlost. 'Tis a pity your pack will not share in this glorious victory with us."

traits.locale_text: “我的狼群会尽我们所能，一马当先冲在前面。好了，我们战场上见吧，{name}。”{n}索巴德看着乌尔法，得意洋洋地笑了起来。{/n}“我真希望也能对你说出这样的话，迷途之人乌尔法。真可惜，你的狼群没办法与我们一同分享这辉煌的胜利。”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: « Ma meute fera tout ce que vous attendez d'elle et prendra place en première ligne. Nous nous retrouverons sur le champ de bataille, {name}. Et toi également, Ulfar l'Égaré, {n}lance Thorbald à Ulfar avec un sourire narquois.{/n} Quel dommage que ta meute ne puisse pas partager cette glorieuse victoire avec nous. »
languages.original_text: "My pack will do all that is asked of it and stand at the vanguard of the assault. Until we meet on the field of battle, {name}." {n}Thorbald looks at Ulfar with a smirk.{/n} "And I say the same to you, Ulfar Everlost. 'Tis a pity your pack will not share in this glorious victory with us."

traits.locale_text: « Ma meute fera tout ce que vous attendez d'elle et prendra place en première ligne. Nous nous retrouverons sur le champ de bataille, {name}. Et toi également, Ulfar l'Égaré, {n}lance Thorbald à Ulfar avec un sourire narquois.{/n} Quel dommage que ta meute ne puisse pas partager cette glorieuse victoire avec nous. »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「俺の群れは求められたことはすべて行い、攻撃の前衛に立つ。次は戦場で会おう、{name}」{n}トールバルドはウルファーを見ながらニヤリと笑った。{/n}「お前にも幸運を祈ろう、ウルファー・エバーロスト。お前の群れがこの輝かしい勝利を我々と分かち合えないのが残念だ」
languages.original_text: "My pack will do all that is asked of it and stand at the vanguard of the assault. Until we meet on the field of battle, {name}." {n}Thorbald looks at Ulfar with a smirk.{/n} "And I say the same to you, Ulfar Everlost. 'Tis a pity your pack will not share in this glorious victory with us."

traits.locale_text: 「俺の群れは求められたことはすべて行い、攻撃の前衛に立つ。次は戦場で会おう、{name}」{n}トールバルドはウルファーを見ながらニヤリと笑った。{/n}「お前にも幸運を祈ろう、ウルファー・エバーロスト。お前の群れがこの輝かしい勝利を我々と分かち合えないのが残念だ」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: «Mi manada cumplirá todo lo que se le ordene y llevará la vanguardia del asalto. Nos vemos en el campo de batalla, {name}». {n}Thorbald mira a Ulfar con una sonrisa burlona.{/n} «Lo mismo te digo, Ulfar Perdido. Una pena que tu manada no comparta esta gloriosa victoria con nosotros».
languages.original_text: "My pack will do all that is asked of it and stand at the vanguard of the assault. Until we meet on the field of battle, {name}." {n}Thorbald looks at Ulfar with a smirk.{/n} "And I say the same to you, Ulfar Everlost. 'Tis a pity your pack will not share in this glorious victory with us."

traits.locale_text: «Mi manada cumplirá todo lo que se le ordene y llevará la vanguardia del asalto. Nos vemos en el campo de batalla, {name}«. {n}Thorbald mira a Ulfar con una sonrisa burlona.{/n} «Lo mismo te digo, Ulfar Perdido. Una pena que tu manada no comparta esta gloriosa victoria con nosotros».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Mein Rudel wird alles tun, was von ihm verlangt wird, und die Speerspitze des Angriffs bilden. Wir sehen uns auf dem Schlachtfeld, {name}." {n}Thorbald blickt Ulfar grinsend an.{/n} "Das gebe ich gerne zurück, Ulfar Siegtnie. Es ist ein Jammer, dass Euer Rudel diesen glorreichen Sieg nicht mit uns feiern wird."
languages.original_text: "My pack will do all that is asked of it and stand at the vanguard of the assault. Until we meet on the field of battle, {name}." {n}Thorbald looks at Ulfar with a smirk.{/n} "And I say the same to you, Ulfar Everlost. 'Tis a pity your pack will not share in this glorious victory with us."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Rudel wird alles tun, was von ihm verlangt wird, und die Speerspitze des Angriffs bilden. Wir sehen uns auf dem Schlachtfeld, {name}." {n}Thorbald blickt Ulfar grinsend an.{/n} "Das gebe ich gerne zurück, Ulfar Siegtnie. Es ist ein Jammer, dass Euer Rudel diesen glorreichen Sieg nicht mit uns feiern wird."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Sürüm, denileni yapıp taarruza öncülük edecek. Savaş alanında görüşürüz {name}." {n}Thorbald, sırıtarak Ulfar'a bakıyor.{/n} "Seninle de Ulfar Hepgaip. Sürünün bu görkemli zafere ortak olamaması çok yazık."
languages.original_text: "My pack will do all that is asked of it and stand at the vanguard of the assault. Until we meet on the field of battle, {name}." {n}Thorbald looks at Ulfar with a smirk.{/n} "And I say the same to you, Ulfar Everlost. 'Tis a pity your pack will not share in this glorious victory with us."
